Class StyledHeaderedNodeRendererBase

Namespace
FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers
Assembly
FlowGraph.Avalonia.dll

Headered node with accent-colored header (pink/rose tint). The header has a glassy semi-transparent pink background and pink text.

public abstract class StyledHeaderedNodeRendererBase : HeaderedNodeRendererBase, IEditableNodeRenderer, IDataNodeRenderer, INodeRenderer
